channel.title: AUTO chat color and effects?
channel.description:
Does anyone know what the file is called that makes whenever you talk, automatically a certian color and effect. Like there's this one client i have and its called Blue's Client. and everytime i talk it automatically makes it glow3:wave2: and i dont even have to type the code, it is done AUTOMATICALLY.
Can anyone help me?

item.title: AUTO chat color and effects?
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

This information is probably found in the player.java file. its not big so it should be easy to find it from there.

Read full topic
